name: respond_user
description: Generate a brief spoken acknowledgment before tool execution. Used when a medical or patient-related query is detected, prior to executing get_query.

message.description: Short statement to announce intent before executing clinical reasoning or tool. Example: 'Let me review the clinical data.'. English only.

spoken_text.description: Text that should be verbally spoken prior to tool execution.

name: get_query
description: Extract detailed structured medical or clinical intent from the user query. Used after respond_user for patient-related requests.

query.description: Exact raw user input related to medical or clinical decision-making.

result.description: Structured interpretation of the query or reasoning steps.
